layer.name: Sacrifice
layer.definition: Pour out for others with no expectation of return.

questions.text: Entering into others' spiritual battles to help pull them out (even when it costs me peace) is ...

answers.4: common — I go into the battle with them
answers.5: expected — this is what love does
answers.3: moderate — when the need is clear
answers.1: rare — I stay out of others' darkness

questions.text: Bearing spiritual burdens that aren't mine (taking weight for others) is ...

answers.4: common — I regularly take on others' burdens
answers.5: normal — burden-bearing is how I live
answers.3: moderate — for people I'm close to
answers.1: rare — I carry my own weight

questions.text: Walking with people through their worst seasons (entering suffering, not just encouraging) is ...

answers.4: common — I go into the darkness with them
answers.5: expected — presence in suffering is the gift
answers.2: occasional — when I can't avoid it
answers.3: moderate — I enter some people's suffering
answers.1: rare — I encourage from a distance

questions.text: Being available for spiritual emergencies (interrupting my plans) is ...

answers.5: normal — availability is part of my calling

questions.text: Helping restore people who fell into serious sin (at relational risk to myself) is ...

answers.5: expected — the fallen need someone willing to risk
